Package eduni.simanim

Classes concerned with providing simulations with animation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Anim_applet The superclass for all animated simulations.
Anim_param An animation parameter, parameters are used to display data relating to its parent entity during an animation.
Anim_port An animation port, used to store display information about the port for the animation.
Param_type An animation parameter type.
 

Package eduni.simanim Description

Classes concerned with providing simulations with animation.
